name: Perfectly Cooked! (Demo)
description:
This project was created as part of Group Project module during year 1 at the University of Northampton. As the lead designer for this game I'm proud with how it turned out, there are things that could be improved upon in places and I'm hoping to perhaps refine these in the future.

A part of my Learning with Games Series, this game focuses on the idea of Kinaesthetic Learning, removing the fear of time pressures within the game, this bright and colourful game helps to develop knowledge within a kitchen.

Group Members - Nat, K, Miku (artists), Brandon, Luke (programmers)
